_header: This world is but a vanity
_description: Mane nobiscum domine — a hymn of four quatrains (aaab) with this refrain and 4-line burden: ‘O blessed lord full of pete / Mane nobiscum domine’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
This worlde ys but a vaniteSubtile & fals and no
                    surte…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Helpe vs of this mortaliteMane nobiscum
                    domine
